rows.label: qst711501_msg0002
rows.name:
I am an adventurer who studies
the relationship between ether
and Divine Beasts. Yes.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0003
rows.name:
Are you all familiar with the
black, stream- like phenomenon
called ether miasma?

rows.label: qst711501_msg0004
rows.name:
Recently, it seems that an ether
miasma, albeit small in scale, has
been confirmed here in Gula. Yes.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0005
rows.name:
I also headed to the site for
investigation, but on the way,
I was chased by monsters...

rows.label: qst711501_msg0006
rows.name:
For an adventurer like me who
specializes in intellectual work, I
was at a loss as to what to do. Yes.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0007
rows.name: So, I have a proposal for you all...

rows.label: qst711501_msg0008
rows.name:
I'd like you to defeat the Espina
Feris that is bothering me.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0009
rows.name:
If you do so, I can immerse
myself in my research on
ether miasma. Yes.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0010
rows.name: Well then, I'm counting on you. Yes.
